articles.title: The latest news on Microsoft’s acquisition of Activision Blizzard - Polygon
articles.description: As the $69 billion merger faces scrutiny from regulators like the FTC, the CMA in the UK, and the European Commission, here’s the latest news on the deal that could bring Xbox, Call of Duty, Warcraft and Candy Crush under one roof
articles.content: Microsoft is attempting to persuade regulators around the world to clear its $68.7 billion acquisition of Activision Blizzard the biggest deal of its kind the gaming industry has ever seen. Amid conc… [+6291 chars]

articles.author: Herman Mostert
articles.title: Lions go down to Stade Francais after second half horror show - News24
articles.description: A second half horror show saw the Lions go down 17-7 to Stade Francais in their European Challenge Cup clash at the Stade Jean-Bouin in Paris.
articles.content:
A second half horror show saw the Lions go down 17-7 to Stade Francais in their European Challenge Cup clash at the Stade Jean-Bouin in Paris on Saturday.

articles.title: Japan, US and Europe must act together on China, PM Kishida says - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: If Russia’s use of force goes ‘unchallenged, it will happen elsewhere in the world, including Asia’, Japan’s PM says.
